How To Use Client¶

Instructions how to use the JEasyCryptoClient

Startup¶

Choose the CryptoServer address in form of IP-address or hostname

Main menu¶

Menu consists of: 1: Capability

2: Encrypt

3: Decrypt

4: Quit

Capability¶

Check the crypting capabilities from the server

Encrypt¶

Choose the method for encryption (reverse, matrix, cyr or rot13)

Enter the text to be crypted

Decrypt¶

Choose the method for decryption (reverse, matrix, cyr or rot13)

Enter the text to be decrypted

Quit¶

Quit the program

JEasyCrypto
